description: Details of the Noise Assessment pursuant to condition 6, Sound Insulation condition 7 and External Noise Rating condition 8 of planning permission 213518FUL dated 01/07/2021 varied by 221459VAR dated 11.11.2022 for: Construction of a single storey ground floor rear extension to existing commercial unit and installation of chimney flue following demolition of existing outbuildings; construction of a first floor rear extension to enable conversion of existing first floor flat from a 1x1 bed to 1x2 bed flat with rear roof terrace; and construction of second floor to create a self-contained unit, with rear roof terrace; alteration to external elevations, with associated cycle and refuse storage - Amendment seeks to omitted ground floor and first floor extensions
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
